messages.message: Seems like exporting results (for download) on sandbox breaks.
Only for CSV though. Excel download works.

i’m able to export results as a CSV download for my app batch

which app did you run on aihub-sandbox? what is the app batch id?

it’s because we use `/download_zip` to download a folder of CSV files (see example download link https://aihub-sandbox.internal.instabase.com/instabase-sandbox-org/travis.testsand_instabase.co[…]I%20Hub%20Results-csvdata-2024-01-08-16:07:00/%22] (https://aihub-sandbox.internal.instabase.com/instabase-sandbox-org/travis.testsand_instabase.com/download_zip/fs/S3%20Test%20Drive/app-runs/2010064b-4cb4-4715-9575-81575c2750c4/1704700221066/output/exported?files=[%22Amazon%20Receipts%202-Instabase%20AI%20Hub%20Results-csvdata-2024-01-08-16:07:00/%22]))

and we only allow `download_zip` for drives called “Instabase Drive” in the server-nginx config (https://github.com/instabase/instabase/blob/caf39cb/deployment-configs/chart/templates/server-nginx/cm.yml#L665) :disappointed:

however, note that the example download link above uses “S3 Test Drive”, not “Instabase Drive”

this is because this commercial org uses “S3 Test Drive” as its default drive
we use a different route to download a single excel file, so that’s why exporting an excel file download works
ok cool, thanks for looking into it
